MaterialsFactoryForge.name: Forge
MaterialsFactoryForge.description: A unique factroy for forging specialized machinery parts needed to construct vehicles. Requires Coke or Petrol.

MaterialsFactoryMetalPress.name: Metal Press
MaterialsFactoryMetalPress.description: A heavy automatic press that refines materials into a denser form.

MaterialsFactorySmelter.name: Smelter
MaterialsFactorySmelter.description: An industrial smelter for melting down Salvage to remove impurities. Requires Coke.

MaterialsFactoryAssembly.name: Assembly Bay
MaterialsFactoryAssembly.description: An assembly bay with specialized equipment for quickly building and packing materials needed on the frontlines.

MetalworksFactoryBlastFurnace.name: Blast Furnace
MetalworksFactoryBlastFurnace.description: A large industrial cauldron for liquefying metals to remove impurities from advanced materials.

MetalworksFactoryRecycler.name: Recycler
MetalworksFactoryRecycler.description: Advanced sorting machinery for sifting piles of scrap metal for useful materials.

MetalworksFactoryEngineering.name: Engineering Station
MetalworksFactoryEngineering.description: An expanded workshop for manual process of delicate materials.

CoalRefineryCokeFurnace.name: Coke Furnace
CoalRefineryCokeFurnace.description: A high powered furnace that brings Coal to high temperatures to seperate out non-volatile Coke.

CoalRefineryLiquifier.name: Coal Liquefier
CoalRefineryLiquifier.description: Processing vats that refines Coal into Oil.

CoalRefineryAdvancedLiquifier.name: Advanced Coal Liquefier
CoalRefineryAdvancedLiquifier.description: Advanced processing vats that refine large amounts of coal into Heavy Oil.

OilRefineryReformer.name: Reformer
OilRefineryReformer.description: A large processing drum that allows for the controlled introduction of hydrogen to yield a similar output of Petrol for less raw oil.

OilRefineryCrackSchack.name: Cracking Unit
OilRefineryCrackSchack.description: A high-heat furnace that catalyses raw oil into refined Heavy Oil.

OilRefineryPetrochemical.name: Petrochemical Plant
OilRefineryPetrochemical.description: A blast furnace that further refines Heavy Oil into an Enriched Oil needed for advanced processes.

AmmoFactoryLargeShell.name: Large Shell Factory
AmmoFactoryLargeShell.description: Produces large calibre ordinance for use with tanks and artillery.

DieselPowerPlantPetrol.name: Petrol Power Plant
DieselPowerPlantPetrol.description: A generator that burns petrol to generate more power.

PowerStationSulfuricReactor.name: Sulfiric Reactor
PowerStationSulfuricReactor.description: A reactor that combines Water with Heavy Oil or refined Coke, resulting in a more pure natural gas, which in turn is more efficient at generating power. Chunks of raw Sulfur are created as a byproduct.
